metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10875 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A flaw was found in ansible. ansible.cfg is read from the current working directory which can be altered to make it point to a plugin or a module path under the control of an attacker, thus allowing the attacker to execute arbitrary code.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-10875` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ansible - 2.0.0.2-2ubuntu1.3
ansible-fireball - 2.0.0.2-2ubuntu1.3
ansible-node-fireball - 2.0.0.2-2ubuntu1.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ansible package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.0.0.2-2ubuntu1.3').
